verses.name: 1 Kings 18:38
verses.text: Then the fire of the Lord fell, and consumed the burnt sacrifice, and the wood, and the stones, and the dust, and licked up the water that was in the trench.

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:39
verses.text: And when all the people saw it, they fell on their faces: and they said, The Lord, he is the God; the Lord, he is the God.

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:40
verses.text: And Elijah said unto them, Take the prophets of Baal; let not one of them escape. And they took them: and Elijah brought them down to the brook Kishon, and slew them there.
